overview: Taxi Taxi is a unit of Anand Palanisamy Group based at Coimbatore, India. Taxi Coimbatore will redefine the call taxi system by introducing luxury cars at a very nominal price. Coimbatore Taxi offers courteous service to the customers and ensures their safety with more advanced features. The people of Coimbatore are always ready for new innovations. So the newly added event in the innovative list for the coimbatoreans is TAXI TAXI. Initially when Taxi Taxi was launched, many people in the city had a question in their mind. Why Taxi Taxi as lots of Taxiâ€™s are being launched day by day around the city. The best answer to this could its Quality Matters. Taxi Taxi is not the useful cabs which run in and around Coimbatore. The unique designed Taxi Ford Fiesta stands different from other in the city by its color , service and the rhyming telephone number. People can reach Taxi Taxi also through online. That is they offer people with online cabs booking. The last mention but not least would be the Captains i.e. Drivers, who take Taxi Taxi on the road are great service men for the people. Enjoy safe travelling by selecting Taxi Taxi.
